replies.body: What happens if you're a baddie that got stuck in Iron 4 due to an AFK Annie and people no longer want to play with you cuz of your bad rank? LUL rip life.

UUUUU... Some advice I read once:

If you represent 1/5 players it means 4/5 of the players on your team are potentially not great. But on the opposite team the chances are 5/5. So if you play well you'll slowly win more than you lose.
